code: import{useDrag,useDrop}from'react-dnd';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Button=_ref=>{let{value,onClick,index,moveButton,removeButton}=_ref;const[{isDragging},drag]=useDrag({type:'BUTTON',item:{index},collect:monitor=>({isDragging:!!monitor.isDragging()})});const[,drop]=useDrop({accept:'BUTTON',hover:draggedItem=>{if(draggedItem.index!==index){moveButton(draggedItem.index,index);draggedItem.index=index;}}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{ref:node=>drag(drop(node)),className:`relative p-4 w-20 h-20 flex justify-center items-center bg-blue-400 text-white text-xl font-bold rounded-lg shadow-lg cursor-move transition-all duration-300 transform hover:scale-110 ${isDragging?'opacity-50':''}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onClick(value),className:"w-full h-full text-white hover:text-gray-800 bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-700 rounded-lg focus:outline-none transition-all duration-300",children:value}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeButton(index,value),className:"absolute top-1 right-1 text-red-500 text-sm font-bold",children:"\u2716"})]});};export default Button;
